column2: claim
Rio de Janeiro, Brazil hosted the 2016 Summer Olympics.

Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.

The Great Wall of China was built to protect against invasions.
The human body contains 206 bones in adulthood.
The Earth orbits around the Sun.
Alexander Graham Bell invented the telephone.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
DNA stands for Deoxyribonucleic Acid.

World War II ended in 1945.
Oxygen is necessary for human respiration.

Photosynthesis occurs in plants.

Gold's chemical symbol is Au.

Vincent van Gogh painted 'The Starry Night'.

Humans have 23 pairs of chromosomes.

The Earth's atmosphere is approximately 78% nitrogen.

The speed of light is faster than the speed of sound.

Elephants are the largest land animals.
The currency of the United Kingdom is the British Pound.

Michelangelo painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel.
The human eye can distinguish approximately 10 million different colors.
